Title: Memory Wine
Description:
<The radio static crackles, and Agent Connelly continues speaking.>

Now comes the real challenge, $Gladdie:lassie;. 

Head on over to the center of camp and see what you can overhear.
ObjectivesText: Use the Kor'kron Disguise to enter the camp. Then drink the Memory Brew and witness Shan Kien's past.
RewardText: Back so fast, rookie? So what did ye learn?
